General.Name: SatixFy Communications Ltd
General.Description: SatixFy Communications Ltd. develops end-to-end next-generation satellite communications systems. The company offers satellite payloads, user terminals, and modems. Its products include modems that feature software defined radio; fully electronically steered multi beam antennas; and very small aperture terminals and multi-beam fully electronically steered antenna arrays for various mobile applications and services. SatixFy Communications Ltd. was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Rehovot, Israel.

5.Name: Mr. Charles A. Bloomfield
5.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of SatixFy Space Systems UK Ltd
